title: Product Catalog Presentation
description:
Description
For an internal user
who wants to create a new mobile contract on behalf of the customer
the Product Catalog
Is a Crucial source to support all sales and service processes with necessary product data and price information.
that contains the complete portfolio that is to be offered to the customer. For the presentation of all products, the product catalog contains descriptions, product images or instructions or specifications. The consistent descriptions enable products to be compared.
Unlike todays solution like BSP or CARMEN
our solution ...
